title: ALFI brand ABN1616-BSS Shower Niche, Brushed Stainless Steel
features: Unlike traditional niches that require extra labor and expensive tile work, this niche is fully finished and ready to mount into your wall opening. Save hundreds of dollars over tiled niches and enjoy the sleek clean look of stainless steel. Clutter-free appearance with no leaks
When it comes to square niches this 16" niche is as large as can be in order to still fit between the studs. The extra height accommodates hose taller shampoo / soap bottles.
Not just for your shower or bathtub! This recessed niche is a perfect addition to your bathroom wall, adding convenient space to use for necessary storage or d√©cor.
Please note that the shampoo, soap and other accessories shown in some of the images or for demonstration purposes only and are not included.
Includes adhesive strips on the back edges and easy-to-follow instructions for fast 3 step installation.
Made of solid 304 series stainless steel which is waterproof and rustproof. Perfect for a wet environment.
Sloped on all sides by approximately 2 degrees to allow for quick water drainage out of the niche.
Installs between studs for a neat, recessed appearance.
Sturdy 20 gauge welded construction which is 3/8" thickness.
description: This ALFI brand large square stainless steel shower niche offers the practical convenience of recessed shelving within your shower or bathroom, offering a space saving solution for soaps, shampoos, and other shower essentials. Sleek stainless steel provides durability and longevity, enhancing your bathroom decor with modern appeal for years to come. It comes in two stylish finishes to accommodate your bathroom style, polished and brushed stainless steel.
